champ_0095_rival_02: I saw you going into the Gym and came running![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_03:
Listen, I’m really sorry I couldn’t battle you last
time we ran into each other.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_04:
Wait—don’t get me wrong! I didn’t chase you
down just to battle you![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_05:
Then again...I guess I wouldn’t MIND a battle or
anything, if you wanted to... What do you say?[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Yesss! Battle tiiime! You and me,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_07:
C’mon! It’ll just be, like, a really short battle!
I’ll only use four Pokémon! I promise![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_08:
Wait, hold on... I wanna be sure to pick the right
Pokémon for where you’re at in your journey.[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_09:
Sorry, gimme a sec to fine-tune my team! Then
we can battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0095_rival_10:
In fact, while you’re waiting, go ahead and take
on the Gym![VAR 0114(0004)]
